jd: From: Roshan, Vyzeinc roshan@vyzeinc.com Reply to: roshan@vyzeinc.com Job DescriptionPosition: Angular Expert with C#Location: RemoteDuration: 6+ MonthsVisa: USC/GC OnlyInterview Process: Skype + FloCareer Technical Assessment Project Overview:Polaris is seeking a high-level Angular expert to assist with a delayed project that requires code revision and enhancement.The application scope has changed, and the new hire will clean up and improve the existing code.Candidates must commit to long-term work and be independent problem solvers.Strong communication skills are essential due to previous interview challenges.The team is using Angular v18; experience with v13+ is a must.Key Requirements:7+ years of web application design and development experience using:Angular, Angular Material, TypeScript, JavaScript.NET, C#, Visual Studio, MVC frameworksHTML5, CSS3, SASSAngular Expertise:Must be skilled in building Angular solutions from the ground up.Strong understanding of design patterns (behavioral, structural, creational).Responsive UI development experience is mandatory.C# & .NET Knowledge:Must have C# experience, preferably in an MVC environment.Cross-browser application development using web services, Ajax, XML, and CSS.Ability to coordinate across multiple environments and troubleshoot issues.Nice to Have:Full stack development experience.Experience working with SQL Server.Additional Details:Candidates must complete a FloCareer technical assessment to verify technical skills.Short-term contractors will not be considered—long-term commitment is required.Communication skills are critical due to prior feedback.
